title: We all have our reasons
creator_credit: Iris Films, Frances Reid and Elizabeth Stevens
brief_description: We all have our reasons for drinking, yet seldom do we examine our reason. This film takes us into a group of women alcoholics whose sobriety ranges from one week to five years. We hear them talk about their experiences.
